text: Carole Lombard (October 6, 1908 - January 16, 1942) was an American actress. She was one of the highest paid movie stars in Hollywood with the total of $500,000. She was listed as one of the greatest female actors of all time. Lombard was born on October 6, 1908 in Fort Wayne, Indiana United States She studied at Virgil Jr. High School and then at Fairfax High School. She was married to William Powell from 1931 until they divorced in 1933. Then she was married to Clark Gable from 1939 until her death in 1942. She had 3 stepchildren. Lombard died on January 16, 1942 in a plane crash in Mount Potosi, Nevada, United States of America aged 33 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Carole Lombard at Virtual History *Carole Lombard at Find a Grave Category:1908 births Category:1942 deaths Category:Actors from Indiana Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Aviation deaths in the United States Category:People from Fort Wayne, Indiana
title: Carole Lombard
